game_description: Get ready to experience the nature of work in five different energy sectors with Adapting Futures. Learn about what it’s like to work in petrochemicals, cleantech, high tech, industrial construction, and renewables. Whether you’re an experienced, transitioning, or new worker, see how your skills align with numerous career opportunities. These five unique sector modules will not only show users a glimpse of the work but also test their skills with minigames and challenges inspired by the energy industry. Hosted by the charismatic Appo, an expert robot in all things energy, try one or try all five tours as a tool to help determine where each worker’s future prospects lie in the ever evolving energy industry. This VR experience will send users a career profile with skills they can take to www.careersinoilandgas.com to see what opportunities the energy industry has in store for their experience level, career interests, and skills.
review_1: I wrote a blog about your app for educators.
